title: Why i don't go in as support
body:
I love support, but I can't stand the fact that if i put support in as my secondary i will get it 90% of the time

Quite frankly I'd be more likely to play it if i wasn't made sick of it, basically i just go in as top mid now because if i hit fill or support at all i get support.

i like all the lanes, but hitting fill gives me the same damned lane each time... not good

replies.body:
It's so bad though, like it ruins the whole fill mechanic for me

Seriously i've undiversified because of it, i used to do all roles, now i only do mid/top because i'm fucking sick of support and wound up out of practice with jg/adc to the point where i don't even want to take them ranked anymore
